Articles.Content:
SYLANDRO'S PLANET WAREHOUSE

Hello! This is the dev thread for my planet pack. So far, it only adds in 1 gas giant, Rictell.

--

IMAGES:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

--

Special thanks to: KillAshley, Me (for getting enough motivation to finish this), Thomas P., and the other nice guys at the Kopernicus IRC channel!

Kopernicus

Edited September 1, 2015 by Sylandro
I'm working on a new, kerbin-like moon for Rictell. It's a bit too early in dev for pics, however.
A Counter-Jool! Weird but interesting and possible.

A Counter-Jool! Weird but interesting and possible.

Yep!

It's going to be an interesting and fun location to go to.
Doublepost: Guess what's coming back!

Doublepost: Guess what's coming back!

http://i.imgur.com/BWGqLiC.png

Yes! I love Jool+.

Yes! I love Jool+.

The only problem (so far) is that Wexx's ring's really doesn't look real solid like Sarnus's.

Doublepost: Some more beauty shots around the currently unfinished Wexx system.

--

And here's what the Wexx System looks like so far.

Some minor updates are done to the planets, Cyrion, and Ioryon got the hugest facelift, and Belenus has been made to be more pizzalike. Mamma mia!

Triple post:

Just a heads-up, the whole JoolPlus: Revived planet pack won't be released until Wexx, Orbornio, Pippitus, Karion, and some new moons of Jool are finished.

I just added your mod to the Kopernicus Planet Wiki. I'm excited about the direction this mod is going to, and I LOVE the stockalike look, especially on the gas giant. Most people just take a real image of a gas giant and ridiculously color it.

I just added your mod to the Kopernicus Planet Wiki. I'm excited about the direction this mod is going to, and I LOVE the stockalike look, especially on the gas giant. Most people just take a real image of a gas giant and ridiculously color it.

Thanks man!

Doublepost: Dev on JoolPlus: Revived has been slow, since i don't have access to the files, since that they're on another computer. But i have been making textures--so that's a good thing.

UPDATE

Orbornio and Pippitus have been added in.

Javascript is disabled. View full album
Edited September 4, 2015 by Sylandro

Triplepost: Orbornio and Pippitus's moons are mostly done. JoolPlus dev will be moved to another thread fairly soon.

Anyway, i'm thinking about future expansions for Sylandro's Planet Warehouse.

So far, i have:

Morgul, a medium-sized planet with a thin atmosphere orbiting inbetween Eve and Moho on an eccentric orbit, and has two moons, Pez and Eek.

Pupitor and Ronnel, two binary planets orbiting in a 23 degree inclination near Dres's orbit. Pupitor will be a gas giant, and will have five moons, Floe, Itapu, Brak, Zorak and Mattu. Ronnel, will be a desert planet, and Ronnel will have two moons, Cannen and Tortes.

Gepitu, a gas giant that will orbit past Jool, and will basically be a placeholder Wexx, or a GP2, you might say. Gepitu will have four moons, Deck, Nanel, Halved and Theion.

And last, but not least, Sorges, which will orbit past Gepitu, and be a Gas Planet 3 analouge. Not exactly a gas giant, but will have a thick atmosphere. Sorges will have three moons, Rotel, Cali and Mohev.

I'm not sure if i want Sorges to have a wacky epileptical orbit, but hey, it'll be a challenge to get to.
Any news?

I'm working on Wexx.

Release is actually somewhat close! Although, Hyugens has to be overhauled.
Like how close.

Like how close.

Fairly close.
So is this still a thing that's gonna happen, or nah?
Hope you're still at this as it looks very interesting

Hmm...this mod looks interesting
Is it still being developed?
Also, I am currently trying to organise a planet mod that changes a lot of bodies in KSP, and I'd like this to be something I can maybe borrow textures/configs/etc. for, would I be allowed to? If so thanks :3, but if not I understand
I'm guessing this mod is dead?
